name: ACP Smart Medicine & AHFS DI Essentials (via STAT!Ref)
description: Smart Medicine is a Web-based decision-support tool designed for rapid point-of-care delivery of up-to-date, evidence-based guidance for clinicians. This is a collection of modules divided into five topic types:• Diseases• Screening and Prevention• Complementary and Alternative Medicine• Ethical and Legal Issues• Procedures. ** AHFS DI Essentials is designed to offer health professionals easy access to knowledge that is critical at the point of care. Essentials™ monographs draw on the meticulously evidence-based guidelines in the full AHFS DI database, distilling for the health professional the essential information on prescription and key over-the-counter (OTC) drugs in an easy-to-use, highly structured outline format. **
